creator: lars.nooden@gmail.com
text:
Apache's project Lucene has no description apparent anywhere on the main page or
in the 'about' section.  

I'm nearly certain this is the wrong category, but as there is no category in
bugzilla for Lucene nor contact information on the lucene page, I will try here.

Hi Lars, please use Lucene's issue tracking system for Lucene-related bugs:

http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LUCENE

Thanks!
creator: andreas@apache.org
